name: Fantasma (itch)
description:
Fantasma is a retro 2D maze game for Windows.

Features
  • Collect items to increase your score and lives.
  • 18 increasing-difficulty levels.
  • Bonus levels.
  • Secret levels.
  • Local leaderboard.
How to Play
  • Use the arrows on the keayboard to move.
  • Collect skulls to reveal new passages.
  • Find the treasure key on each level to open the coffin and go to the next maze.
  • Avoid the enemies!

Enjoy and leave a comment!
